main event: Witnesses observed a round object approximately two inches in diameter, changing color from white to amber, during a thunderstorm in Columbus, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., The object was stationary and did not emit any sound or exhaust., There were thunderstorms in the area during the observation., The report concludes that the object was probably a balloon., Multiple aircraft were noted to be in the area at the time of the sighting.
